item.author: å´æ‰¿æ©
item.text_trans: When I was a child, I especially liked watching the cartoons of Journey to the West. The title song is so sung: Monkey brother, you really can't... Now look at the original, and find that the monkey brother is not only not good, but great. The cute pig's eight rings in the animation became a lazy, old-fashioned, and sorrowful, fat-stricken pig. The sand monk only picks up the baggage, and the sense of existence is almost zero. As for Tang Yan, there is a saying that riding a white horse is not necessarily a prince, but it may also be Tang Yan. I donâ€™t think Tang Yan is the prince of the prince. The emperor was his brother, and the king of the daughter asked him to be a Hummer. The female fairy on the road would sleep with him (rather than eating him). Only the white horse has not changed anything. In short, the cartoons brought me, and the simple and simple understanding of Journey to the West seems to be gone. The experience has become more cruel, and "Journey to the West" is more like "Great Monkey King" to me.

Now I have finally waited until the publication of the hardcover edition of the four famous editions of the Humanities Edition. I like to sell it, so I donâ€™t hesitate to order a full set of four orders. look forward to! After receiving it, I couldnâ€™t wait to unpack and unpack it. I thought it was a big surprise! Oops, itâ€™s a pity: the cloth is hard and the fabric is not fake (and the fabric is still very good), but the most vulnerable place to break - the original spine that uses the fabric is the kind of white paper that is very hard to use! The thick hardcover book, the paper spine is not bad, it may not turn a few times, the paper spine will be broken, which is difficult for the readers. When reading, be sure to lay the table flat, carefully flip it, otherwise the spine will be bad. Now! In addition, the book box is not full fabric, the side is actually paper, the box is cloth on both sides, the quality is good, but the two sides are not wear-resistant paper, the combination of paper and cloth is easy to break, four The book box has not been unpacked and found that there are two boxes of cloth and paper joints have been broken, and the box is too tight, put the book into the box and take out is a technical activity, a little careless, the paper spine is broken! Isn't this the greatest design? The design award should be awarded to the finishing designer! Anti-human design! I completely dispelled the idea that I wanted to buy two sets before!

item.name: å››å¤§åè‘—:è¥¿æ¸¸è®°(äººæ°‘æ–‡å­¦ç‰ˆ)(å¥—è£…ä¸Šä¸‹å†Œ)
item.author: å´æ‰¿æ©
item.summary_trans: No backstage was killed by a stick
item.text_trans: Whenever I open the Journey to the West, there is always a different mood. It is the most lively among the four famous books. When I was a child, I always thought it was both fun and interesting. But today, what remains unchanged is the mysterious, colorful mythical world, and my understanding has changed. This is a classic masterpiece that everyone loves to read. Everyone can get different feelings and revelations when interpreting it. Some people like its distinctive character personality; some people like its magnificent overall image; some people like it lively and humorous. Dialogue narration; some people also studied its historical background and social phenomena. But in my opinion, his tortuous plot hides the ideal of life and human pursuit that people are eager to reach, that is freedom. On the days when the personality is constrained day after day, the people of the 21st century are particularly yearning for freedom, longing for the embodiment of freedom: Sun Wukong. Sun Wukong broke out of the ground, "not under the jurisdiction of the unicorns, not obeying the Phoenix tube, and not obeying the human throne", the Dragon Palace, the Department of the murder, from the Huaguoshan on the king. It can be said that humanity has been freed from all constraints and completely free. Sun Wukong is actually the embodiment of freedom. The most prominent of his qualities is the yearning for freedom. He is always pursuing freedom. All his struggles are also for freedom. Such a vivid image gives the reader a power and courage to pursue freedom and chase freedom. However, everyone understands that in the present, even in the future, complete freedom is ultimately impossible, and people are always subject to such constraints. Although we are surrounded by a constrained world, we can make our hearts as broad and deep as possible, so that it can be boundless and inclusive. However, there are still many people in the society who are bound by something of little value, but they are happy and feel very satisfied. After hundreds of years of exploration and development, people's demand for material is no longer urgent, but the demand for spiritual freedom has been ruined. In short, I think that what modern people lack most is a spirit of open-mindedness and the pursuit of maximum freedom. In the "Journey to the West", which has been tempered by time, it deeply contains the spirit of freedom that people most desire in the new century... I understand why it can be passed down to this day.

item.summary_trans: The greatest anti-corruption, anti-corruption, anti-dereliction, and anti-dictatorship in Chinese history! ! !
item.text_trans: 1 Journey to the West is undoubtedly the highest in the ideological realm of the four famous works. The author expresses a deep research on social problems with seemingly absurd myths. Monsters, dead, are local hegemony, but no background. , not dead, are some people above, two groups, show ... ... Unfortunately, the author did not jump out of the historical framework, if written, Sun Wukong went to the Heavenly Palace, killed the Jade Emperor and Guanyin Bodhisattva and Buddha Buddha are the true foundings of democratic ideas. Unfortunately, the authorâ€™s warriors, the final ending is also bought, the lifelong civil servants and the glory of the official ranks, so that when they start, they can sing. The practitioners finally became a bureaucrat and became a part of the interest group. Sadly... 2 The four famous books published by the Peopleâ€™s Literature Publishing House can be described as simple, without extra binding, paper, printing, typesetting. Itâ€™s all in the middle of the game. Itâ€™s not a big mistake, and itâ€™s the first choice. Suggestions, consider the next time, when the next publication, the width of the world will be re-released, the number of pages in a single book will be reduced, and the "Journey to the West", "Water Margin" and "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" will be changed into three sets, and "Dream of Red Mansions" will be changed. For the four sets, redesign the cover, which is perfect.

item.name: å¤å…¸åè‘—æ™®åŠæ–‡åº“:è¥¿æ¸¸è®°
item.author: å´æ‰¿æ©
item.text_trans: "Journey to the West" is one of the four classic Chinese classics, written by Wu Chengen. This book describes the legendary story of Sun Wukong, Pig Bajie, and Shawujing to protect the Tang Dynasty from the West. Through the illusory world, the author's attitude towards the feudal rulers is quite interesting. In The Journey to the West, there is simply no competent emperor. If Buddhism was created by Buddhism, the monks could not be fascinated by money, but the Buddha actually acquiesced to accept bribes by his men, reflecting the dark scenes of the feudal society.

I only thought that the book was very long and the story was wonderful. Now, after more than ten years, I am still fascinated when I pick it up. I just discovered that the book is so short. I read it for two days, and I lost my original excitement, but I have more sorrow for the Great Holy Spirit. Is it the feeling of growing up?

item.text_trans: The Kindle version bought is good overall. The status of the novel "Journey to the West" in the novel world is not mentioned. In my opinion, Journey to the West is a true book of spiritual practice. From a natural stone monkey to learning art, to a big trouble to the heavenly palace, to the protection of the Tang dynasty, to the victory of the Buddha, it is a process of pain and growth. As can be seen from the whole book, Sun Wukong has different performances at various stages. Sun Wukong has Huigen from beginning to end, and it is more transparent than Tang Yan on many issues. And in the final stage, compared to the pigs, Tang Yan is obviously more confident in Sun Wukong. These subtle changes, I think that Sun Wukong is a true good friend. He wants to live for a long life and is a comedy.

item.name: å¤å…¸åè‘—æ™®åŠæ–‡åº“:è¥¿æ¸¸è®°
item.author: å´æ‰¿æ©
item.text_trans: When I was a child, I liked to watch the 86th edition of "Journey to the West". I felt that Sun Wukong was cool! I have been reading the original books until now, and I admire Wu Chengen very much. "Journey to the West" is one of the four famous books in China. The classics are worthy of being passed on forever. I hope more and more people can reread the classics. The brotherhood between Wukong, Wuneng and Wujing in the book is very deep and makes people move. Of course, Satay is also more than the words in the TV series. Don Juan is not necessarily so rigid. Sun Wukong is not omnipotent. Even if it is the Qitian Dasheng of the Tiangong, it also needs the help of gods and bodhisattvas. The friends have more roads to go! Sometimes, the demon is a person, and sometimes the person is no different from the demon. We are all mortal mortals, and the inferiority is still there. Only wish to walk in the world with a kind heart. We, people, are really small, and they are all yellow and dreamy.

item.name: å¤å…¸åè‘—æ™®åŠæ–‡åº“:è¥¿æ¸¸è®°
item.author: å´æ‰¿æ©
item.summary_trans: No backstage was killed by a stick
item.text_trans: Whenever I open the Journey to the West, there is always a different mood. It is the most lively among the four famous books. When I was a child, I always thought it was both fun and interesting. But today, what remains unchanged is the mysterious, colorful mythical world, and my understanding has changed. This is a classic masterpiece that everyone loves to read. Everyone can get different feelings and revelations when interpreting it. Some people like its distinctive character personality; some people like its magnificent overall image; some people like it lively and humorous. Dialogue narration; some people also studied its historical background and social phenomena. But in my opinion, his tortuous plot hides the ideal of life and human pursuit that people are eager to reach, that is freedom. On the days when the personality is constrained day after day, the people of the 21st century are particularly yearning for freedom, longing for the embodiment of freedom: Sun Wukong. Sun Wukong broke out of the ground, "not under the jurisdiction of the unicorns, not obeying the Phoenix tube, and not obeying the human throne", the Dragon Palace, the Department of the murder, from the Huaguoshan on the king. It can be said that humanity has been freed from all constraints and completely free. Sun Wukong is actually the embodiment of freedom. The most prominent of his qualities is the yearning for freedom. He is always pursuing freedom. All his struggles are also for freedom. Such a vivid image gives the reader a power and courage to pursue freedom and chase freedom. However, everyone understands that in the present, even in the future, complete freedom is ultimately impossible, and people are always subject to such constraints. Although we are surrounded by a constrained world, we can make our hearts as broad and deep as possible, so that it can be boundless and inclusive. However, there are still many people in the society who are bound by something of little value, but they are happy and feel very satisfied. After hundreds of years of exploration and development, people's demand for material is no longer urgent, but the demand for spiritual freedom has been ruined. In short, I think that what modern people lack most is a spirit of open-mindedness and the pursuit of maximum freedom. In the "Journey to the West", which has been tempered by time, it deeply contains the spirit of freedom that people most desire in the new century... I understand why it can be passed down to this day.

By the way, excellence, when Amazon entered China in 2007, I was buying books with excellence. It was the first time I bought a book online, and the picture was cash on delivery. At that time, I did not trust online payment. So many years have passed, the reasons for choosing excellence are 3 points: the first genuine price is cheap; the second package is good, the express is fast; the third is often full of money to give books. However, in the past two years, the discovery of excellence has gradually reduced the cost, and its price is no longer the cheapest on the online store. Packing can use plastic bags instead of cartons. I used to buy more than 3 books in general, and I put paper boxes in the box to prevent them from falling. It's no longer there, and the books I buy now are enough to be packed in a box. It won't do it anymore. I just use a plastic bag to sway the book inside. Free shipping for 29 yuan has become a full 49 yuan, online shopping is now very developed, the choice of buying books is more for most people, the most affordable consumers will choose,,,,,,

item.name: å››å¤§åè‘—:ä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰(å¥—è£…ä¸Šä¸‹å†Œ)
item.author: ç½—è´¯ä¸­
item.text_trans: The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is not only an earlier historical novel, but also represents the highest achievement of ancient historical novels. The novel adopts a close-knit classical Chinese language, which is bright and fluent, and enjoys both tastes and elegance. The brushwork is rich in change, contrasting against each other, sideways, sideways, swaying and swaying. With its grand structure, it has organized a series of complicated and complicated events and numerous characters in a hundred years, and the narratives are organized in an orderly manner, echoed in front and back, linked to each other, closely linked, and promoted at different levels. The artistic achievement of The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is more important in the description of war and the shaping of characters. The novel is best at describing wars and can write the characteristics of each war. Pay attention to the application of different strategies and tactics under specific conditions, and guide the subjective initiative of combat, without spending the main pen and ink on the simple strength and martial arts contest. Such as the Battle of Guandu, the Battle of Chibi, the Battle of Fuling, etc. The writing of each war also changes with the characteristics of war. While writing wars, it also writes other activities as a prelude to war, aftermath, or as an aid to war. The wars that are intense and thrilling have been shown to be relaxed and slow. For example, before the battle of Chibi, describe the cooperation between Sun and Liu, the contradiction between Zhuge Liang and Zhou Yu, the temptation of Cao Cao, the preparation of Sun and Liu Lianjun to lure the enemy, etc. In the shaping of characters, the novel pays special attention to putting characters In the sharp contradictions of the actual struggle, they express their ideological character through their words and deeds or their surroundings. Such as Cao Cao's treacherous, every move seems to conceal intrigues and tricks; Zhang Fei's heart is straightforward, nothing with innocence, slapstick color; Zhuge Liang God machine counts, the temporary can always be handy, calm and unhurried. The famous Guan Yu "Wen Jiu Hua Xiong", "Five Wu Guanjun Liu Jiang", Zhang Fei "Wei Zhen Chang Bridge", "Zhao Yun" single ride to save the young master", Zhuge Liang "Seven Meng Meng won", "empty city "Retreating Sima Yi" and so on is a very popular chapter. "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is based on history, but it is not a history book but a literary work. Because it has been processed through art, there are many fictions. The art of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" It is multifaceted. 1. It has successfully shaped many characters. It has written more than 400 people, among which the main characters are artistic examples with vivid characters and vivid images. All kinds of characters have commonalities; Personality. The author describes the characters, is good at grasping the basic features, highlighting certain aspects, exaggerating, and using contrasting and setting off methods to make the characters vivid and vivid. This is a basic principle of the author's shaping of characters. The best explanation is that the so-called "three musts" have always been the "sexuality" of Cao Cao - treacherous people; Guan Yu's "righteousness" - "meanings like mountains"; Kong Ming's "intelligence" "- Witness is extraordinary. The main method of portraying characters in a novel is to put characters in a thrilling military and political struggle and to shape them in sharp and complicated conflicts. For the main characters, often through a series of storylines and Character language expresses its complex character. 2. It is longer than describing war. The book has written more than forty wars, showing a thrilling war scene. Among them, the war of Guandu, the battle of Chibi, the battle of Fuling Excellent. For several key battles that determine the rise and fall of the Three Kingdoms, the author always focuses on describing and writing all aspects of the war, such as the strategic tactics, power comparison, status transformation, etc. Rich and colorful, varied and unique, fully embodies the complexity and diversity of war; it not only writes the fierceness, tension, and thrill of war, but does not appear miserable, generally has a high-spirited style, and some also perform calmly. There is silence in the movement, there is Zhang and relaxation. 3. Its structure is magnificent and rigorous and exquisite. The time is up to 100 years, the characters are many Hundreds, the events are intricate, and the clues are numerous. The description must conform to both the basic facts and the coherence of the artistic plot. Therefore, there are great difficulties in the arrangement of the structure. However, the author can write well and clearly. Each time can be independent, and the whole book is a complete art whole. This is mainly due to the grand and strict conception of the author. He focuses on the story of the conflict between the three countries and focuses on the storyline of the three countries. The twists and turns are changeable, but they are coherent; there are both masters and slaves, but the masters are closely cooperating. 4. The language is refined and understandable. Today, this language seems to be inconspicuous, but at the time it was Nearly vernacular; writing novels in this language is a kind of pioneering work. Compared with the rough and noisy language of some novels in the past, it is a clear progress. The biggest shortcoming of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms is the character. Characterization is fixed, lack of developmental changes. This may be influenced by the stereotypes of folklore characters and historical materials. Second, imagination, exaggeration and sometimes unreasonable. Mr. Lu Xun said: "I want to show Liu Chang's long and thick and pseudo-like, like Zhuge's wisdom and near demon." This criticism is very pertinent. The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is one of the most successful and influential works in ancient historical novels. It is widely spread and has a lot of charm. It has an indescribable deep influence in the history of Chinese literature and people's lives.

item.author: ç½—è´¯ä¸­
item.summary_trans: Luo Guanzhong is also a wizard
item.text_trans: I haven't bought this version. I have seen the Romance of the Three Kingdoms in junior high school. I don't know how many times I have read the romance of the Three Kingdoms. I don't know how many books I bought. I used to buy books only and didn't write reviews. Just watching the TV dramas of the Three Kingdoms, I saw a section of Wang Yunâ€™s departure from Dong Lu and his son. Just boring, I will pour water. It is said that the article in the world is generally copied, and it depends on who is copied. Luo Guanzhongâ€™s history of reading the classics is as curious as Shima Qiang, which is like tactics. So the historical strategy he has come to know, and also written into the novel. Therefore, some classic bridge breaks in the Three Kingdoms are true in history, but the names of people are not right. For example, Wang Yunqiao is a serialist, and Dong Zhuo and Lu Bufu and his son are separated. I have been familiar with people who have read the Spring and Autumn Annals. The king of Chuping is a joint marriage with Qin. For his son Xiong Jian's wife, he later married his daughter-in-law. The same is true of Lu Huigong (father) and Lu Yinong (child).

The question is: "Because there is no interference in the world, the party will transcribe it from beginning to end, and come out with legends. In general, because of disillusionment, he wants to see the prosperity of the year (seeing the sky); And the generation of passion (by the color of love); then the passion into the "remarks of the prosperous and prosperous" of the novel (transmission into the color); from the description of the prosperous life of the wind to realize that life is a dream after all (self-color Wukong) Many of the typographical books published now include the words "from now on, empty people" as the subject before these four sentences. This is the text that has been added according to Cheng Gaoben. There are no existing fat reviews in these words. After the Tibetan sentence is four sentences, there is the subject of "empty airway people". This is correct, and it is now. The empty airway people are easily named as love, and the "stone record" is changed to "love record". To Wu Yufeng's title "Dream of Red Mansions" To Wu Yufeng's title "Dream of Red Mansions" - this sentence has nothing, Found in Awake. "Please tell me, which one is the original? item.text_trans: This book was first printed in 1982, the second edition in 1994, and the first edition of the third edition in July 2008. It has been printed 23 times in total, which shows its influence and highlights its problems: 1. The new edition is very unreasonable. It is recommended to return to the previous four volumes of Cheng Bing. I have a version of two brushes and three volumes that I have on hand. It is only 561 pages. It is very inconvenient to read, not to mention the two volumes. 2, no illustrations less ornamental, it is recommended to restore the illustrations of the old version of Liu Dan House, or choose Wang Yizhai and others, there is a lot of room for choice. 3, at the same time out of hardcover, should also be out of the traditional straight line to expand the influence of Chinese culture. 4. The price drops to a reasonable range. The publisher should be self-disciplined, the price, and the publishing office should also be in charge. If the book is shrunk and the book price is high, then the Humanities Society will inevitably be suspected of being a big bully.

item.name: çº¢æ¥¼æ¢¦(å¥—è£…ä¸Šä¸‹å†Œ)(äººæ°‘æ–‡å­¦ç‰ˆæ–°ç‰ˆ)
item.author: æ›¹é›ªèŠ¹
item.summary_trans: Very good book, itâ€™s a little white, but itâ€™s fine.
item.text_trans: I am very affectionate about this book. The first edition of my brother bought the first print, a total of three volumes, code ocean 4.1 yuan. At that time, I just went to kindergarten. When I graduated from high school, the first volume was lost. I had to buy a new one. Although it was still three volumes, I have added illustrations and the price is 12.3 yuan. In the bookcase, when I returned to my hometown last year, only half of the illustrations and a few pages of illustrations were left. I was particularly distressed. After returning to Beijing, I found this version in the old book stalls in Ditan Bookstore. The price was 7.8 yuan, which is better than the one I bought. The date of publication is still early. Compared with the previous two editions, the third edition has changed a lot and achieved excellence. For example, the author has listed the author from the cloud section as a separate fate; and changed Linâ€™s eyes from â€œa pair of likes and dislikesâ€. "A pair of weeping and crying reveals the eyes"; "Lu Xueyu" is restored to the base of "Lu Xueguang", which is a huge improvement. However, there are also a few white plaques. In the foreword, the eternal age of Jiachen is â€œfive years oldâ€ printed as â€œfifteen years oldâ€; in the transcripts listed, the åè— has not been added; the first edition of â€œcold burialâ€ "Flower soul", now changed to "cold moon funeral poetry soul", but also need to discuss business. It is a pity that the illustrations have been deleted. I hope to correct it when I reprint. But I still quite like this version.

I even admit that my requirements for the book are nearly demanding, but that's it, so I want to buy another one. After waiting a few days, when I found this book again on Excellence Online, I found that the price actually rose to 45.4 yuan, almost the same as the price; and compared with the previous price, it rose 69%! It is pirated paper. I was very dissatisfied with the last time I bought a book for excellence. It was mainly because the delivery was slow and I had a week! This time is even more dissatisfied! Because excellence is not only slow delivery (cards are shipped at the expected time, do not give people a courier buffer time, did not get the book within the expected time), and the book is like pirated. I am still not sure, I will go to the bookstore to check it out. If the situation is true, I am really disappointed. Before my friend heard me introduce the book in excellence, she said that she had a copy of it, I still don't believe it. Because I have been buying books for so many years, I really don't feel the problem of piracy, but this time I feel very suspicious. It took more than 40 yuan to buy this set of books for love and reading, and the price is not cheap, but it is this quality. Friends who want to buy this set of books should think about it. The bookstore edition is only a little more than a dozen dollars, but the quality is no problem. I regret it. I want to return the trouble. Think about it, let me see it first.

item.summary_trans: Excellent quality is not said, but this time it is very unpleasant! !
item.text_trans: I bought a lot of things on the excellent, excellent product quality, the price is very fair, including this book, but the quality of this delivery is very unpleasant! ! ! This is the case. I live in Chengdu, Sichuan, and I went out because of things. Yesterday I processed the mail online and bought this book by the way. Because I am going through my birthday. On the order, I specially marked the weekend delivery, because I was not at home these days, I was able to come back on the weekend, but the excellence even ignored my request, and I sent the goods today! ! ! God, when I received the delivery notice, I was still on the long-distance bus in Ya'an. But when the goods arrived, I couldn't bear to refuse. item.text_trans: The school's note book of the Red Institute is still somewhat guaranteed compared to the so-called schoolnotes in the market. However, the book of the Institute of Red Research has a flaw, that is, it is a comprehensive book. It is clear that the first 80 copies of the book are the Geng Chen of the fat system. It is reasonable to say that the last 40 times of the Chenggao system should not be added. Itâ€™s not a bad thing. Looking at it this way, it is not as pure as the two kinds of fat books (Tongfu School, Gengchen School Edition) and Mr. Qi Gong presided over the school's note of the North Normal University version of Cheng Jia. Deng Yufu's book is only the content of the fat book, but also with most of the fat, the school is also the most detailed one of the more popular revisions. Of course, the quality of the revision is a matter of opinion. I personally think that the quality of the revision is better now. In addition, I personally think that it is better to have a copy of Zheng Qingshanâ€™s school, Wu Mingâ€™s exchange school, etc. Yu Pingbo The school is also good, it is too old. As for Feng Qiyong's "Liu Zhaizhai Re-evaluation of Stone Recital School Review", Zhou Yichang's "Stone Memorizing the Truth", Chen Qinghao's "Newly Edited Stones and Sticking to the Diet" and the photocopy of the fat book, etc. The average reader who does not study red studies is not able to afford it, or it is not necessary to buy it. It is skipped here. The Beijing Normal University version of the 120-story version of the book is the Chengjia version of the Chenggao system. It is more organized before and after. I am not saying that Cheng Gaobenâ€™s literary character is better than the fat one, only that it is less contradictory. Moreover, the Beijing Normal University edition is still the most detailed one in the current version of the Dream of Red Mansions. There are also many notes on the schoolnotes of the Red Institute, but it is not as good as the Beijing Normal University edition. Others in this book are better, and there are also the notebooks of Cheng Yi and the school of Feng Qiyong, which were published by the Humanities Society in the past.

I remember that there was a saying that it used to be four great books, and later it became four famous books. The difference is to replace "Jin Ping Mei" with "Dream of Red Mansions" on the grounds that the spread and influence of Jin Ping Mei is not conducive to the spread of traditional culture. Jin Pingmei is a naked city life, and the Dream of Red Mansions just poetically like this life. It is as kinky as it is, but it is just a dark line, but it is not taken from the scene. Throughout the book, it is more like Cao Xueqin's prosperous life after the defeat of the world. Like Li Weiâ€™s words after his death.

item.text_trans: I sent you an e-mail from the 31st book to give you excellent after-sales service. It took me 4 days to send the book I want to change. The funny thing is that I only sent a copy of "Luohai Qinsheng" to change, the other 5 "Dream of Red Mansions" and so on. I haven't seen anything yet; the only thing I laughed at is that the only book I sent was the same as the one I wanted to change, and it was folds and indentations. I would like to ask if there is any difference between this and no change! Excellence doesn't want to be sincere, even if you don't have to look like it, who do you want to see? ! No longer have any expectations for excellence! It turns out that you are such after-sales service! ! ! Never again will not be able to patronize this black shop that deceives consumers! ! ! Thoroughly disappointed. But fortunately, let me see two things: First, the excellent book, there is not a book that is completely new, and all the books and scripts that are not sold from the bottom of the box are not sold; The outstanding so-called serious and responsible staff, there is no such thing as a corpse meal! From this book exchange, I deeply understand that there is no integrity in excellence! I know that you will not change books for me. It doesn't matter, you should be bitten, eat a long, smart, and will not buy books in your thrift store again! ! ! ! ! !

item.author: æ›¹é›ªèŠ¹
item.text_trans: To say which one of China's best books is, don't dare to say that the history class is Sima Qian's "Historical Records", while the literary class, Cao Xueqin's "Dream of Red Mansions" is innocent as the first! The new version of the People's Literature Edition is still good overall. The comments are more detailed and precise, which is an advantage that other versions cannot match. As for the paper, I feel that it is generally worthy of the discounted price, but the binding is worse, and the bottom of the next volume is the back cover. Even a line is not too much, it seems too much regret, a piece of paper can How much is it worth? The most irritating thing is the "commemorative card" and the girdle that are sandwiched in the book. It is obviously advertising. Originally, the pattern on the girdle was still visible, but it was written on the card and the waist seal. "Li Shaohong directed the TV drama based on the original." This sentence is really disgusting, it is simply commercial speculation. You know, the version is good, the TV series is not good, it is a bad game! The human version of "Dream of Red Mansions", which has been revised many times, is originally good in terms of content. At least it is not worse than other versions. Why do you need to play such a superfluous advertisement? The humanities community is too unconfident! If this version can be equipped with color illustrations, made into a hardcover book, divided into three to four bookbinding, it is almost perfect! The price is twice as expensive, it is worth it!

The next day, I waited all day. I didn't call me. I couldn't wait for it at night. I turned over and called and said, "I didn't send you today, tomorrow." Now I have finally waited until the publication of the hardcover edition of the four famous editions of the Humanities Edition. I like to sell it, so I donâ€™t hesitate to order a full set of four orders. look forward to! After receiving it, I couldnâ€™t wait to unpack and unpack it. I thought it was a big surprise! Oops, itâ€™s a pity: the cloth is hard and the fabric is not fake (and the fabric is still very good), but the most vulnerable place to break - the original spine that uses the fabric is the kind of white paper that is very hard to use! The thick hardcover book, the paper spine is not bad, it may not turn a few times, the paper spine will be broken, which is difficult for the readers. When reading, be sure to lay the table flat, carefully flip it, otherwise the spine will be bad. Now! In addition, the book box is not full fabric, the side is actually paper, the box is cloth on both sides, the quality is good, but the two sides are not wear-resistant paper, the combination of paper and cloth is easy to break, four The book box has not been unpacked and found that there are two boxes of cloth and paper joints have been broken, and the box is too tight, put the book into the box and take out is a technical activity, a little careless, the paper spine is broken! Isn't this the greatest design? The design award should be awarded to the finishing designer! Anti-human design! I completely dispelled the idea that I wanted to buy two sets before!

Taking Baodiâ€™s love tragedy as the main line and the rise and fall of the four major families as the background, it depicts all aspects of Chinese feudal society in the 18th century and the burgeoning of emerging capitalist democratic thoughts under feudal autocracy. The structure is grand, the plot is euphemistic, the details are exquisite, the characters are vivid and the voices are vivid. It is a classic in Chinese ancient novels.

item.text_trans: The Preface to the Third Edition of "Dream of Red Mansions" The first edition of this book was published in 1982. It has been the 25th anniversary of the past, and the circulation has exceeded 3.5 million sets. In 1994, when the written world was twelve years old, we revised it once, corrected some of the omissions in the first edition, and absorbed new results in the study of red studies. Itâ€™s been 13 years since the last revision. Redology is one of the most mass-oriented scholarships. It has a much larger research team and readers than any other discipline. In the course of these thirteen years, in the study of Hongxue, there are naturally many gains. Therefore, we decided to make revisions again.

item.text_trans: As the most widely disseminated literary classic in China, there are currently no fewer than one hundred masterpieces published in the world, but the quality is uneven. In short, most of them are for a "money". It can be said that none of them is a treasure of the family. People treasure a lifetime. The four famous works published by People's Literature Publishing House are relatively good, but there are also many problems: First, the new version has no hardcover, not good storage, and no grade; second, the quality of binding is not high, and the middle is easy to break, especially "Dream of Red Mansions" It is too thick to be loaded into two volumes; the third is that the selected version is not uniform enough, too noisy, and the readers have a larger opinion. Therefore, it is recommended that People's Literature Publishing House carefully summarize the lessons and lessons of the past four famous masterpieces, strive for excellence, and resolve to publish a classic version with higher quality and more satisfying readers!

item.text_trans: "From the perspective of the ideological tendency reflected in "Dream of Red Mansions", the author has preliminary democratic ideas. His darkness to the real society, including the court and officialdom, the decay of the feudal aristocracy and his family, the feudal imperial examination system, the marriage system, and the slave system. The hierarchical system, and the social ruling thoughts that are compatible with it, namely the Confucius and Mencius, the Cheng and Zhu philosophical studies, the social moral concepts, etc., have all been deeply criticized and put forward the ideals and propositions with the initial democratic nature. And the claim is the tortuous reflection of the budding factors of the capitalist economy that was growing at the time." The person who wrote this sentence is a cultural traitor!

item.name: çº¢æ¥¼æ¢¦(å¥—è£…ä¸Šä¸‹å†Œ)(äººæ°‘æ–‡å­¦ç‰ˆæ–°ç‰ˆ)
item.author: æ›¹é›ªèŠ¹
item.summary_trans: a book that is convenient for general readers to read.
item.text_trans: This set of "Dream of Red Mansions" is based on Cheng Yiben, the second book that Cheng Weiyuan and Gao Wei repaired and printed after Cheng Jiaben, that is, the book "Dream of Red Mansions" as a complete book of 120 books. The second appearance, its content is about 20,000 words more than Cheng Jiaben, and some omissions in the initial printing have been supplemented. For example, the "Furong Daughter", which is not included in Cheng Jiaben, has been added to make the whole book more complete. Its printing has ended the era of the "Dream of Red Mansions", which has made "Dream of Red Mansions" widely spread. It can be called the "Red House" hero (naturally, from another perspective, some people have also turned it into a sinner of Cao). It is true that Cheng Yibenâ€™s deviation from the manuscript of A Dream of Red Mansions is more serious than that of other manuscripts. However, if it is not for professional red studies, from the perspective of universal reading, I think that Cheng Yiben is actually a better copy of the popular "Dream of Red Mansions". The book cover of the writer's publishing house is exquisite and well-documented. I think it is convenient for general readers to read. It is worth recommending to everyone. Of course, if you want to further study the similarities and differences, and ask for the source along the wave, then you can look at other transcripts (but the transcripts are not complete after all, and ultimately you still have to rely on the prints to complete, such as the very hot fire of the Zhou Yichang school, after all, only Eighty times, it is inconvenient for ordinary readers to see). Impression, Zhonghua Book Company out of the process, the most influential People's Literature Publishing House is based on Geng Chen, and there are other books that everyone can refer to.

item.text_trans: 1. Utopia and idyllic pastoral 1.1 Utopia Utopia (Eutopia) What is it? For a long time, people emphasized its unreality, but ignored its true inner meaning and inclination. In the introduction of Principles of Hope, Bloch considered "Utopian" to be a derogatory term, that is, with human beings. Proportional hope and all that it includes. In fact, what is marked by this concept exists in the edge of the consciousness that gradually accommodates any object, and exists in the rising horizon of the rising horizon. The hope, hope and intention towards the unrealized possibilities are not only the basic characteristics of human consciousness; if they are specifically taught and grasped, they are also a basic determination of the objective reality (Chen Anzhen. 2000). The discussion of the object consists of two parts, one is the description of the Utopia form, and the other is the description of the relationship between Utopia and reality, and the Utopia itself and his creators. 3 Grand View Garden Yu Yingshi believes that Cao Xueqin created two distinct and contrasting worlds in The Dream of Red Mansions. These two worlds refer to them as â€œthe world of Utopiaâ€ and â€œthe world of realityâ€. These two worlds, implemented in the book "Dream of Red Mansions", are the world of Grand View Garden and the world outside the Grand View Garden (Yu Yingshi. 2001). The opposition between these two worlds lies mainly in "love" and "obscenity". This article mainly uses his arguments to elaborate. 3.1 The production of the Grand View Garden Yu Yingshi believes that the Grand View Garden is a human projection of the illusory world. There is such a kind of Gengchen Benzhi: The Grand View Garden is a sinister and awkward. The word "Xuan" in "Xuanjing" is actually the word "magic", which must be the typo of the copywriter, because there are still many words in this article that are wrong. Therefore, according to the view of Zhi Yanzhai, the Grand View Garden is a human projection of the illusory world (Yu Yingshi. 2001). And Jia Baoyuâ€™s dreams of being too illusory have many overlaps with the Grand View Garden. In the actual construction process, the realistic base of the Grand View Garden is mainly composed of two old gardens: the Huifang Garden in Ningfu and the Old Garden in Rongfu. These two gardens are the dirtiest places in the real world, but they provide the raw materials and base for the most clean ideal world of Grand View Garden. The clean ideal world in A Dream of Red Mansions is based on the most dirty real world (Yu Yingshi. 2001). 3.3 â€œGrand View Gardenâ€ and reality â€œDaguan Gardenâ€ is the ideal utopia of Cao Xueqin's structure, but it is closely related to reality. The original site is the dirtiest place in reality, and it is displayed through the plot of â€œJade Jade Funeral Flowerâ€. It is still connected with the dirty world outside, and can only keep the spirit clean of the self. Finally, under the invasion of the outside world, the "Grand View Garden" eventually fell apart and went to the end. As the relationship between Utopia's "Grand View Garden" and reality, there are three points worthy of attention. First, it is derived from reality and has certain communication with the real world. Secondly, people in Utopia are not ignorant of the outside world, but they are not aware of reality. Resist the external world; in the end, the real world is much stronger than Utopia in power, so it is inevitable to go to destruction, because it exists in essence to live with reality, so the more beautiful it is, it is destroyed. The more thorough. 4 From â€œPeach Blossom Springâ€ to â€œDaguan Gardenâ€ compared to Tao Yuanmingâ€™s â€œPeach Blossom Springâ€, Cao Xueqinâ€™s â€œDaguan Gardenâ€ is also a reaction to reality, but it has a closer relationship with reality, and the most important thing is that he Destroyed his utopia by hand. Here, China's "shi" is no longer entangled in the two value systems of salvation and self-rescue, which have different values. (Although this is a complementary whole, "Shi" is always in an invincible position), but Clearly aware of the laws of historical evolution, history is not transferred to some extent by human will, especially when human efforts always circulate at the same level. Although it is impossible to provide a constructive road, at least not in the same place, the Utopia â€œGrand View Gardenâ€ is the product of a bleak life. Although it is a â€œnothingâ€, it is the starting point of a new construction. From "Peach Blossom Spring" to "Daguan Garden", the Utopia created by Chinese classical literature has been ruined for nearly 2000 years. The Grand View Garden in "Dream of Red Mansions" contains the essence of the Utopian concept, although in the end Cao Xueqin himself crushed it. The ultimate dimension of "Dream of Red Mansions" is the "emptiness" of Buddhism. This makes the world of "Dream of Red Mansions" without a new historical concept and the dimension of historical scene. This new dimension can also be said to be "modernity". Therefore, "Dream of Red Mansions" is a novel that cannot display the historical vision image (the future time direction). Its final ending can only be destroyed. The language of "Dream of Red Mansions" is "the white earth is really clean", which is a kind of real Degraded literature and historical fables (Wu Xiaodong. 2006). "Modernity", the vocabulary of Western culture heralds the direction of progress, but the lack of learning outcomes in the enlightenment stage is ultimately questionable. After the "Great View Garden" as a Utopia is destroyed, is it necessary to establish a new Utopia?

item.name: ä¸­å›½å¤å…¸æ–‡å­¦è¯»æœ¬ä¸›ä¹¦:æƒå¨å®šæœ¬å››å¤§åè‘—(äººæ°‘æ–‡å­¦ç‰ˆ)(å¥—è£…å…±8å†Œ)
item.author: æ›¹é›ªèŠ¹
item.summary_trans: The book is a good book, the print is too bad
item.text_trans: This set of four famous books is the most authoritative version currently published. I spent 152.70 yuan on the ocean. I wanted to buy a high quality. However, I found that the quality of the prints was really flattering when I got it, too bad! In addition to the title page, it can be seen to preserve the authenticity of the first edition, the paper on the cover, the color, the inscription of Shen Yinmo, the paper of the text, the clarity of the text, the uniformity of the typesetting... and the 70s and 80s of the 20th century. Compared to the versions I have seen in the 1990s, it is a big drop! In particular, the two "Journey to the West", the corner of the viscose is actually damaged - can not help but criticize the People's Literature Publishing House: the famous publishing house, why in the 21st century today, even inferior paper, inferior printing Inferior binding to fool the fans of the four great masterpieces! ? - Really own your own brand! ! ! Imagine: How important is this important classic to the Zhonghua Book Company and the Commercial Press? It must be higher than the People's Literature Publishing House. - But, look at what foreign works like Harry Potter published by People's Literature Publishing House, and what is the "female breasts and fat hips" of Mo Yan, how luxurious and beautiful the packaging is. ! What is this indicating? Explain that the People's Literature Publishing House is now being controlled by some unscrupulous and quick-minded people who are not aware of what is true culture! In addition, Amazon is also really ah, the day before the praise of the business museum's Qian Mu "national history outline" quality is very good, but today sent me four inferior quality masterpieces. The monks once again reminded Amazon to be a boutique to win the respect of customers! Don't be a waste transfer station for some irresponsible publishers! What the consumers pay you is real money! ! !

item.name: ä¸­å›½å¤å…¸æ–‡å­¦è¯»æœ¬ä¸›ä¹¦:æƒå¨å®šæœ¬å››å¤§åè‘—(äººæ°‘æ–‡å­¦ç‰ˆ)(å¥—è£…å…±8å†Œ)
item.author: æ›¹é›ªèŠ¹
item.text_trans: "Chinese Classical Literature Reader Series: The Four Masterpieces of Authoritative Books (People's Literature Edition)" Introduction: The four famous classics are representative works of different categories of Chinese classical novels. The following are the contents: "Dream of Red Mansions": Dream of Red Mansions is an encyclopedia The novel. Taking Baodiâ€™s love tragedy as the main line and the rise and fall of the four major families as the background, it depicts all aspects of Chinese feudal society in the 18th century and the burgeoning of emerging capitalist democratic thoughts under feudal autocracy. The structure is grand, the plot is euphemistic, the details are exquisite, the characters are vivid and the voices are vivid. It is a classic in ancient Chinese novels. "Water Margin" is an excellent novel with the theme of peasant uprising. It is based on the historical events of the Songjiang Uprising in the late Northern Song Dynasty and the folklore that has been propagated. The novel takes Shuibo Liangshan as the background, and depicts the characters as the main line, and draws a large number of heroes with flesh and blood and arrogance. The Romance of the Three Kingdoms is the first chapter of the ancient Chinese classics, and is a classic of historical romance novels. The novel depicts the contradictions and struggles between the three political and military groups of Wei, Yi and Wu led by Cao Cao, Liu Bei and Sun Quan in the late Eastern Han Dynasty and the whole Three Kingdoms. On the broad social and historical background, it shows the political and military conflicts of the era that are sharp and complex and distinctive. In terms of political and military strategies, they have had a profound impact on future generations. "Journey to the West" was compiled by the Ming Dynasty novelist Wu Chengen on the basis of the story of the Tang dynasty and the related words and dramas. The masterpiece of this magical novel is based on the birth of Sun Wukong and the clamoring of the Heavenly Palace. The story of the three masters of the Tang dynasty and the ninth day of the dynasty is the main line of the story. It combines the thoughts and contents of Buddhism, Taoism and Confucianism. It not only allows the celestial beings of Buddhism and Taoism to perform at the same time, but also injects into the world of humanity in the world of the gods and buddhas, which is also harmonious and interesting. This feature has won the hobby of readers of all cultural levels.

item.summary_trans: Practical art, but not just the art of war
item.text_trans: "Sun Tzu's Art of War" is an exception in the ancient texts of the Spring and Autumn Period and the Warring States Period. Other classics such as "Laozi" talk about pure desires, "The Analects of Confucius" speaks of self-denial, "Meng Zi" speaks with the people, and "Zhuangzi" talks about stealing the country. They are basically philosophical thoughts of truce and self-cultivation. The "Sun Tzu's Art of War" did the opposite, providing the practical martial arts of the princes at that time, and some were independent. However, if it is only practical, it will continue to be lost with the changes of the times, and the combat thinking described in the first three articles of Sun Tzu's Art of War is the most crucial. "Notes" "There are five things in the classics, the school's calculations and the feelings: one way, two days, three places, four will, five methods. The Taoist, the people and the consent Therefore, you can die with it, you can live with it, without fear. Heaven, yin and yang, cold and heat, time system also. The land, the high, the near, the danger, the wide and narrow, the dead and the dead. The will, wisdom, Letters, benevolence, bravery, and strictness. The legal person, the melody, the official ethics, the main use also. Those who are these five will not know, the one who knows wins, the one who knows is not victorious." This shows that combat is not just a simple confrontation. Need to consider a number of factors, people's hearts, time, location, generals, military discipline and so on. "Combat articles" "Where the use of the law of the military, thousands of cars, thousands of leather cars, with a hundred thousand, a thousand miles to feed the grain, the cost of inside and outside, the use of guests, the material of the paint, the car, the daily fee Thousands of gold, and then 100,000 teachers lifted. Its use of war also wins, long time the blunt soldiers are sharp, the siege is hard, the long violent division is insufficient for national use. ````The soldiers are idling, not well-behaved For a long time. Those who have not been soldiers for a long time and have a good fortune, there is nothing. So if you donâ€™t know the people who use the soldiers, you canâ€™t know the benefits of using the soldiers.â€ Once the war is declared, all materials and equipment need to spend money. The quick decision will be as muddy as Hitlerâ€™s invasion of the Soviet Union. Watching some "angry youth", fighting is not a child's play, it is not a result of a bloody battle. "The quest for the attack" "Sun Zikai: Where the law of the military is used, the whole country is the top, the country is broken; the whole army is the upper one, the broken army is the second; the whole brigade is the upper, the broken travel is second; the whole pawn is the upper, the broken Secondly; the whole army is on the top, and the ruin is the second. It is the victorious battle of the hundred wars, the good ones who are not good, the soldiers who are not the war, the good ones, and the other, the lower ranks, the second cut, the second cut Soldiers, under the siege. The law of siege is a last resort." Killing one thousand, self-damaged eight hundred, this is a tragic victory. Try to make the other party give in by strategy or diplomatic means, instead of spending military power, this is the total victory. Basically, the combat thinking of Sun Tzu's Art of War is as follows: combat should be considered comprehensively, and advanced weapons and equipment may be used because of the unpopularity of the millet plus rifles; the cost of combat is huge, affecting the normal life of the people. Quick decision; combat is just a means to make others surrender, and it is the best choice to defeat the soldiers without fighting. It is because of these combat ideas that it can become a bestseller of Chinese ancient Chinese in foreign countries.

item.text_trans: "The former grandson, the grandson is not lost; the grandson, the grandson." "The Art of War" is also known as "Sun Wu Bingfa" and "Sun Zi Bingshu". It is a treasure in China's classical military cultural heritage and one of the three major military books in the world. There are a total of thirteen articles in the book. Although there are only 5,000 words, the content is all-encompassing and profound. It involves the laws of war, philosophy, strategy, politics, economy, diplomacy, astronomy, geography, etc. It is a treasure house of ancient military theory. The great masters are widely spread in the world, and the senior management of the West Point Military Academy and Harvard Business School as a must-read textbook for talent training.

item.text_trans: It took me two days to read the whole book. I feel that my grandson is still very domineering. The enemyâ€™s rushing for grain is better than winning the grain from the country. Donâ€™t leave any resources to the enemy. If you can't beat it, you will hide it in the people and engage in terrorist attacks until the big party feels that the maintenance loss is too great and makes concessions. Confidential leaks, leakers kill, secrets kill. The intuitive impression is that as long as you can win, you can do whatever it takes. Directly reminding me of the great red horror of the Soviet era. After the great red warrior caused heavy damage to the enemy, he still hid in the ocean of the masses and waited for the next attack. Bai Hao urgently needed to annihilate these red warriors for his own safety. Therefore, the large-scale raids on nearby villages, the Red Warriors felt that there was no chance to withdraw from the village, but Bai Qi did not know that these terrorists had gone, and still cleaned the village. item.name: å­™å­å…µæ³•
item.author: å­™æ­¦
item.summary_trans: It should be the best version of Sun Tzuâ€™s art of war, but some of it is worth noting
item.text_trans: The full text consists of the 13th chapter of Sun Tzu, the annotated, the translation, Cao Zhu and the test of Mr. Guo. The cover is antique and the paper is very hard. It should be the best version at the moment. In terms of content, the grandson's original text does not have to be said, Cao notes and notes are also very exciting. Mr. Guoâ€™s testimony is somewhat reasonable, but every time he uses Marxism-Leninism philosophy to explain Sun Tzuâ€™s art of war, and moves to include such things as â€œsimple materialismâ€, these Ma Zhe nouns are somewhat reluctantly biased. The so-called "dross" in Sun Tzu's art of war, which Mr. Guo pointed out, is not particularly good. It is not only a disrespect for the sages, but it does not necessarily reflect how eloquent it is. Nothing can be separated from the individual considerations of the time. It is true that the human society and the world are constantly evolving. Part of the content of Sun Tzuâ€™s art of war is now unreasonable, but it uses the current perspective to amplify things that were not thought of or could not be thought of during the grandson of more than 2,000 years ago. The locality also denied that this is not in line with historical materialism. Therefore, regarding Mr. Guoâ€™s test, everyone can be regarded as a family statement, but donâ€™t accept it completely, but use your own thinking to draw the most meaningful conclusions. That is the most important thing. This book is very good, and I am very satisfied. If you have to be nitpicking, from my personal point of view, it would be better if I could add Cao's notes first. After all, the vast majority of readers, including myself, have a relatively limited level of ancient Chinese. Although I can understand it roughly, I always hold a spirit of excellence for the classics. In addition, at the end of each article, the appropriate case is added, not too much, one is enough, and it is best to be close to the grandson. For example, in the Jiu Di article, you can use the battle of Han Xinjing or the battle of Xiang Yu Julu as an example to illustrate the application of the law of death. This will further deepen your understanding of Sun Tzu's Art of War.

item.name: å­™å­å…µæ³•
item.author: å­™æ­¦
item.summary_trans: Sun Tzu's Art of War and Business
item.text_trans: There is a single analogy in the center of Sun Tzu's Art of War, saying that business is a game of winning and losing. Over time, this metaphor becomes the de facto "truth." This metaphor sees the attributes of business as war, that is, the war of sharing the market. All the attributes of the enterprise, such as partnerships, joint ventures and strategic alliances, are hidden behind this attribute. As a metaphor for war, in today's global integration and international interdependence, the ills are more prominent. A small number of companies can operate independently in complex, highly competitive global markets. The general trend of today's world business is the marriage between joint ventures, alliances, and competitors. Their advantage is mutual trust and maintaining a multifaceted relationship in business. This approach allows local companies to benefit from know-how, product and marketing knowledge, while facing foreign partners, they can share their development costs and risk to market a new product, and more importantly, to form alliances with global brand companies. Trust and cooperate with local distributors and use your products. This kind of business cooperation and marriage requires the partners to make a true marriage, that is, commitment and trust. Trust is especially important because it takes a long time to build, but it can easily break down at a critical moment. The opportunistic behavior of either partner will weaken the long-term production cooperation relationship.

item.name: å­™å­å…µæ³•
item.author: å­™æ­¦
item.summary_trans: Anything that can't be done for it
item.text_trans: Although I admire two sentences in my grandson: knowing oneself and knowing each other is not a battle; you can't do it for it. If you think something can be done, don't do it, like gambling. You think you can win. You must lose. If it is for our life, see who you are. If you believe that everything is possible, then do it. If you want to think in a dialectical way, I suggest that you look at Sun Tzu's Art of War, focus on the future strategically, and look at the present. Of course, the first thing to do is to be brave! Then think about things after the failure. I didnâ€™t have enough confidence in myself and didnâ€™t think about what to do after I failed. When the grass is not adequately prepared and the strength is insufficient, the reasons for the failure may fail if the situation of the other party is unclear, and the result fails. Therefore, these two sentences are the most important in Sun Tzu's art of war. Only when you combine them can you do something. Believe in yourself first, strategy second. If you are not satisfied with a bottle of half a bottle, it means that the understanding of Sun Tzuâ€™s art of war is not thorough enough.

item.name: å­™å­å…µæ³•
item.author: å­™æ­¦
item.summary_trans: First-rate books, great content, but there are places to pay attention to.
item.text_trans: This book is top-notch in both the frame design and the print quality. The layout, the notes, the translation, the collation, the trial arrangement and the fonts are carefully arranged. The Cao Cao notes are placed in small red letters. On the side of the original text, we can see the intention of the ancient books publishing house in this book. If the design of a book can be scored, the book will no doubt be close to perfect score. From the content point of view, this book has the original text of the grandson, Cao Cao's notes, has been quite perfect, Mr. Guo Huaruo's note and translation can also be seen to do their best, even more rare is the grandson of each version (predecessors) in There is a slight discrepancy in the text. Mr. Guo will list them one by one in the collation, and then explain the reasons for the choice, which is quite rigorous. But ------ unfortunately, Mr. Guo has a test, in this book, it is similar to the painting. In this trial, Mr. Guo and the author of a new book, "The Sun Tzu's Art of War," screamed and saw this in the exchanges with the ancients, as if they were found in a bowl of soup. A mouse is awkward and can only make people feel sick. What is even more unfortunate is that in the trial, Mr. Lie Guo has repeatedly jumped out to blame the grandson for his inadequacies. (The previous comments said that such accusations are "very good and powerful." If such accusations are reasonable, then it is my generation of scholars. The blessings, but many of the comments themselves are wrong. Such comments cannot bring philosophical truths to the readers, but only allow the readers to fall into the fog. The reason why Mr. Guo made these mistakes is that he is standing on the class struggle. On the standpoint, thinking with materialistic thoughts is that he is at the high position of "the chairman's high participation." The examples cited are not caused by the pre-1949 war cases, but they are self-styled and shackled. The war that Sun Zi said is "the country." How can the war between the country and the country be compared with the war between the zf army and the rebel army? How can the use of rogue tactics between the modern powers? (Before 1980, Chinaâ€™s Diplomacy is a great failure caused by class struggle!) When the United States competes in foreign competition, it uses various means of direct warfare, agent warfare, and economic warfare. When tactics, information stations, cyber warfare, and occupation of the moral high ground of war, Mr. Guo is still talking about launching people, it is simply making people laugh and cry. Mr. Guo commented that his grandson could not see this, not his grandson could not write it (grandson What I want to write is a military book between the country and the country. But Mr. Guoâ€™s thought canâ€™t get rid of the identity of the rogues who joined the army that year! These so-called positions of class struggle, materialistic thoughts are harmful to the book. If readers can set aside these fogs and stand on the country---this stable position, look at the "competition" between countries (not war, how do the grandsons evaluate the war against human life? The goodness of the good and the good of the soldiers), the glory of the Sun Tzu's art of war can be seen before our eyes.
